name: Dear You
description:
---PLEASE FULLSCREEN FOR A SATISFYING ASCII EXPERIENCE---MOBILE NOT RECOMMENDED---

Sometimes, when you're bored, lonely, and stuck in New Jersey, you'll take love from any person willing to give it to you.

...even if they're not really a 'person', per se.

A Twine game by Wally-S about ghosts, deer, and suburban ennui. Features one ending; about a 10-45 minute experience depending on how fast you read.

Minor content warnings for: non-explicit sexual content & emotionally abusive behavior/situations
